title: The Seduction of Mr. Morgan
description: Alex has long lusted after her stepdad Michael. Now that she's eighteen and legal, she's going to seduce him. She has it all planned out. Step one: Let him watch her masturbate in the shower. Step two: Get his hands on her skin with an innocent massage. Step three: Watch him masturbate and get caught watching. Step four... well, even the best laid plans can go awry... Warning: This title is meant for adult audiences only and contains situations that some might consider objectionable or taboo.
